about_the_game:
currently in development

Create the fairy woodland of your imagination

Secret Meadow is a highly visually customizable world. 
The entire forest is your canvas to fill your unique gardens and cozy areas for you to enjoy with other magical creatures.
The core gameplay mechanics focus on exploring the forest, befriending magical creatures, foraging for seeds and natural resources, growing gardens, and crafting adorable items to transform the forest into a fairy woodland of your design.


Help Forest Spirits and other magical creatures claim their home in the forest with you.
Build shrines and complete their requests to learn the secrets of Wind Chime Forest and to get their help on your journey.


Scour the forest for special seeds and natural resources, fish, and harvest in order to craft adorable items and to cook delicious treats for your magical friends.
Find and create everything you need from the nature around you!

Grow magical flowers and plants to expand your fairy's magical meadow

Fill the forest by growing magical gardens decorating them with the special items you craft and customize.
In Secret Meadow, gardening is a low-maintenance magical experience. You can focus on your designs without getting caught up in the tedious life of a farmer!
Gardening & Decorating is not restricted to a specific area of the forest, so you can design unique gardens and cozy areas throughout the entire world!


Scour the forest for special seeds and natural resources, fish, and harvest in order to craft adorable items and to cook delicious treats for your magical friends.
Find and create everything you need from the nature around you!
As you spread your magic, you will unlock new customization options for your Fairy.
Transform and color your hair, eyes, skin, clothes, jewelry, and other accessories to express your fantasy

short_description: Secret Meadow is a cozy atmospheric sandbox RPG. Explore and transform a hand-drawn open world and live the peaceful magical life of a fairy. Without time pressures, combat, hunger, or exhaustion, you can focus on the atmospheric sandbox experience while designing the magical forest of your dreams.
